languages.text: {n}Смерив вас недовольным взглядом, Торбальд сурово отрезает:{/n} "В делах Волков Хальбрандт будет говорить, если пожелает. Не забывай, что мы — избранные воители Всеотца, Вольный Торговец. Не смей обращаться к нам, как к слугам..."

{n}Giving you a disgruntled look, Thorbald sternly cuts you off:{/n} "When it concerns Wolf matters, Halbrandt will speak if he wishes. Do not forget that we are the chosen warriors of the Allfather, Rogue Trader. Treat us like servants at your peril..."
languages.original_text: {n}Смерив вас недовольным взглядом, Торбальд сурово отрезает:{/n} "В делах Волков Хальбрандт будет говорить, если пожелает. Не забывай, что мы — избранные воители Всеотца, Вольный Торговец. Не смей обращаться к нам, как к слугам..."

traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}索巴德不满地看了你一眼，严厉地打断了你的话。{/n}“只要是关于狼群的时候，哈尔布兰特随时随地都可以开口。别忘了，我们是全父亲自甄选的战士，行商浪人。如果你打算把我们当成仆人，后果自负……”
languages.original_text: {n}Giving you a disgruntled look, Thorbald sternly cuts you off:{/n} "When it concerns Wolf matters, Halbrandt will speak if he wishes. Do not forget that we are the chosen warriors of the Allfather, Rogue Trader. Treat us like servants at your peril..."

traits.locale_text: {n}索巴德不满地看了你一眼，严厉地打断了你的话。{/n}“只要是关于狼群的时候，哈尔布兰特随时随地都可以开口。别忘了，我们是全父亲自甄选的战士，行商浪人。如果你打算把我们当成仆人，后果自负……”
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}トールバルドは不機嫌な視線を向けて、ぴしゃりと言葉を遮る。{/n}「狼の問題となれば、ハルブラントは話したいときに話すさ。忘れるな、俺たちは全知の父に選ばれし戦士だ、自由開拓者よ。俺らを従者扱いするなら命を懸けろ…」
languages.original_text: {n}Giving you a disgruntled look, Thorbald sternly cuts you off:{/n} "When it concerns Wolf matters, Halbrandt will speak if he wishes. Do not forget that we are the chosen warriors of the Allfather, Rogue Trader. Treat us like servants at your peril..."

traits.locale_text: {n}トールバルドは不機嫌な視線を向けて、ぴしゃりと言葉を遮る。{/n}「狼の問題となれば、ハルブラントは話したいときに話すさ。忘れるな、俺たちは全知の父に選ばれし戦士だ、自由開拓者よ。俺らを従者扱いするなら命を懸けろ…」
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Thorbald, lanzándote una mirada de desaprobación, te interrumpe con severidad:{/n} «En lo que a Lobos respecta, Halbrandt hablará si lo cree conveniente. No olvide que somos los guerreros elegidos del Padre de todas las cosas, Comerciante Independiente. Trátenos como siervos y aténgase a las consecuencias...».
languages.original_text: {n}Giving you a disgruntled look, Thorbald sternly cuts you off:{/n} "When it concerns Wolf matters, Halbrandt will speak if he wishes. Do not forget that we are the chosen warriors of the Allfather, Rogue Trader. Treat us like servants at your peril..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald, lanzándote una mirada de desaprobación, te interrumpe con severidad:{/n} «En lo que a Lobos respecta, Halbrandt hablará si lo cree conveniente. No olvide que somos los guerreros elegidos del Padre de todas las cosas, Comerciante Independiente. Trátenos como siervos y aténgase a las consecuencias...».
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Thorbald vous coupe sévèrement la parole en vous jetant un regard mécontent :{/n} « Halbrandt s'exprimera comme bon lui semble pour tout ce qui touche aux affaires des Loups. N'oubliez pas que nous sommes les guerriers élus du Père de Tous, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Ne vous aventurez pas à nous traiter comme des serviteurs... »
languages.original_text: {n}Giving you a disgruntled look, Thorbald sternly cuts you off:{/n} "When it concerns Wolf matters, Halbrandt will speak if he wishes. Do not forget that we are the chosen warriors of the Allfather, Rogue Trader. Treat us like servants at your peril..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald vous coupe sévèrement la parole en vous jetant un regard mécontent :{/n} « Halbrandt s'exprimera comme bon lui semble pour tout ce qui touche aux affaires des Loups. N'oubliez pas que nous sommes les guerriers élus du Père de Tous, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Ne vous aventurez pas à nous traiter comme des serviteurs... »
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Mit einem verärgerten Blick unterbricht dich Thorbald rüde:{/n} "Wenn es um Angelegenheiten der Wölfe geht, spricht Halbrandt, wenn er es wünscht. Vergesst nicht, dass wir die auserwählten Krieger des Allvaters sind, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Uns wie Diener zu behandeln, birgt Risiken ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Giving you a disgruntled look, Thorbald sternly cuts you off:{/n} "When it concerns Wolf matters, Halbrandt will speak if he wishes. Do not forget that we are the chosen warriors of the Allfather, Rogue Trader. Treat us like servants at your peril..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einem verärgerten Blick unterbricht dich Thorbald rüde:{/n} "Wenn es um Angelegenheiten der Wölfe geht, spricht Halbrandt, wenn er es wünscht. Vergesst nicht, dass wir die auserwählten Krieger des Allvaters sind, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Uns wie Diener zu behandeln, birgt Risiken ..."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Memnuniyetsiz bir bakış atan Thorbald, seni sert bir biçimde kesiyor.{/n} "Konu Kurt meseleleri olduğunda Halbrandt dilediğini söyleyebilir. Bizlerin Yücebaba'nın seçilmiş savaşçıları olduğunu unutma Hür Tacir. Bize hizmetkârlarınmış gibi davranırsan sonuçlarına katlanırsın..."
languages.original_text: {n}Giving you a disgruntled look, Thorbald sternly cuts you off:{/n} "When it concerns Wolf matters, Halbrandt will speak if he wishes. Do not forget that we are the chosen warriors of the Allfather, Rogue Trader. Treat us like servants at your peril..."

Bizlerin Yücebaba'nın seçilmiş savaşçıları olduğunu unutma Hür Tacir. Bize hizmetkârlarınmış gibi davranırsan sonuçlarına katlanırsın..."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil
